name: Scalloped Oysters
author: Debbie Thomas
summary: Mild oyster taste with a crunch crumb topping.
ingredients: 1 pint shucked oysters, drained with liquid reserved
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Combine bread crumbs and cracker crumbs; stir in the melted butter
Place a thin layer of the crumb mixture in the bottom of the prepared baking dish
Layer the oysters over the crumbs and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste
Pour 2 tablespoons oyster liquid and 1 tablespoon milk over the top
Repeat then cover the top layer with the remaining crumb mixture
Bake at 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) for 30 minutes
